xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/193585-A Farmer in Congress 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null An Egyptian peasant farmer is forced to leave his village for the city in search of better circumstances. While begging, he meets a Al-Manakhily, a con-man who convinces him to take up business running a liver cart. This is his first step into a life of fraud and corruption as he dreams of going to American and one day even visiting the U.S. Congress. A Farmer in Congress
